alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Chilton; Clay; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:34PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Chilton, southern Randolph, Tallapoosa, Chambers, Coosa and southeastern Clay Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Malone to Lay Lake Dam. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Lanett, Roanoke, Dadeville, Goodwater, Camp Hill, Rockford, Kellyton, Equality, Stroud, Stewartville, Weogufka, Lafayette, La Fayette, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Wadley, Lakeview, Five Points and Goldville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and east central Alabama.
